column4: I have a hdd that was in a ubuntu system, I recently did a fresh install with the drive I wanted to save out of the system, I just hooked the drive back up .. How do i find it / mount it ? I am running Jaunty Minimal.
I have alot of /dev/sdx showing up I cant figure out which one is the new drive that I want to mount, THere is sda sda1 sdb sdb1 sdb2 sdb5 sdc sdd sde sdf
it's going to be trial and error then. look in your /etc/fstab to find out which drive ubuntu is already installed on and work from there
